content:
In a Google Calendar, create a weekly recurring event for taking out the trash on Tuesdays. Include the following details:
Title: Trash Reminder
Start Time: 8:00 PM
End Time: 8:30 PM
Recurrence: Weekly on Tuesdays
Location: Home
How can you modify this event to also send you a reminder notification 1 hour before the scheduled time?

To create a weekly recurring event in Google Calendar with a reminder notification, follow these steps:

1. **Open Google Calendar**: Go to [Google Calendar](https://calendar.google.com) and sign in with your Google account.

2. **Create a New Event**: Click on the "+ Create" button usually found in the top-left corner.

3. **Event Details**:
   - **Title**: Enter "Trash Reminder".
   - **Date and Time**: Set the start time to 8:00 PM and the end time to 8:30 PM on a Tuesday.
   - **Recurrence**: Click on the "Does not repeat" dropdown and select "Custom". Choose "Weekly" and select "Tuesday" as the day of the week.
   - **Location**: Enter "Home".

4. **Add Notification**:
   - Click on the "Add notification" option.
   - Set the notification to "1 hour before" and choose your preferred notification method (e.g., email or notification).

5. **Save the Event**: Click "Save" to add the event to your calendar.

This setup will ensure that you receive a reminder notification one hour before the scheduled time every Tuesday, helping you remember to take out the trash.
